name: midnightos
description: AI-powered platform for autonomous agent deployment on the Midnight blockchain

scripts.build: pnpm run build:mcp && pnpm run build:orchestrator && pnpm run build:frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd services/midnight-mcp && pnpm start" "cd services/eliza-agent && PORT=3004 WALLET_MCP_URL=http://localhost:3001 pnpm start:server" "cd platform/orchestrator && PORT=3002 pnpm tsx src/api.ts" "cd platform/frontend && PORT=3003 pnpm dev"
scripts.dev:orchestrator: cd platform/orchestrator && PORT=3002 pnpm tsx src/api.ts
scripts.dev:eliza: cd services/eliza-agent && PORT=3004 WALLET_MCP_URL=http://localhost:3001 pnpm start:server

author: MidnightOS Team
